text: krome tekh, kotoryye raskayutsya i obratyatsya k Allakhu Vsevyshnemu, budut iskat' u Nego zashchity, iskrenne i tvordo poydut po Yego pryamomu puti i budut tvorit' blagodeyaniya. Tol'ko takiye budut s veruyushchimi, a veruyushchim Allakh - slava Yemu Vsevyshnemu! - podgotovil velikuyu nagradu v blizhayshey zhizni i v budushchey zhizni
